text: Seventh Son is a 2014 fantasy-action movie directed by Sergei Bodrov. The movie is set during the medieval period. In this movie are Julianne Moore, Alicia Vikander and Jeff Bridges. This movie was released in the United States in February 2015. The studio which distributes Seventh Son is Universal Pictures. == Resources == Category:2014 action movies Category:2014 fantasy movies Category:2010s American fantasy movies Category:2010s American action movies Category:British action movies Category:British fantasy movies Category:Canadian action movies Category:Canadian fantasy movies Category:Chinese movies Category:Movies directed by Sergei Bodrov Category:Universal Pictures movies
title: Seventh Son
